# Vendors

This directory contains Git submodules that are depended upon by this Git
repository.

## Submodules

| Directory | Used by
|-|-
| `osv-schema/` | [OSV 1.2.0 validation](../advisories/README.md#scripts)
| `secvisogram/` | [CSAF 2.0 validation](../advisories/README.md#scripts)
